```{r}
inventoryA <- filter(InventoryData, Supplier=='A')
```

```{r}
inventoryA = mutate(inventoryA, OnHandRatio = `On Hand` / `Annual Demand`)
```

```{r}
avg_cost <- inventoryA %>% 
  group_by(`Item SKU`) %>% 
  summarize(SKUAvgCost=mean(`Cost per Unit ($)`))
```
